Articles.Content: Very excited for huge intersteller parts and multiplayer!
interstellar flight
Just relieving the memories of starting fresh and needing to learn new features over and over again until I can fly everywhere, set up colonies, explore the 2 new star systems just kerbal around lol
I'm excited for new 8th planet!!!
I expect a more optimized game. I'm tired of crafting with more than 100 parts that turns the game into a slideshow

Everything, really. The whole game looks like a lot of fun, and I look forward to all of the features that will be coming out soon. I cant wait to jump into the first release tomorrow and explore a clean, brand new kerbol system.

Hearing that colonies can be built virtually anywhere on any planet with any parts you like in any configuration along with automatic resupply routes created is really awesome. A little logistics and base-building added into the game. Those are a couple of my other favorite genres, so I'm really excited for that! And getting multiplayer online would be incredible,  Building bases with friends!

I really hope multiplayer is p2p self-hosted. Reduces costs for PD since they won't have to maintain a bunch of multiplayer servers and it guarantees that KSP 2 multiplayer will always be available even if something were to happen and KSP 2 maintenance stops (God forbid)
The new engines! Also the removal of the single core stuff.
I'm excited new, most realistic physic and the option to fast rocket crash
I'm excited to see the potential of this game series and I'm looking forward to being able to build colonies on other planets.
I’m most looking forward to the colonies and multiplayer. I cannot wait to crash my ship into my friend’s colony.
Procedural wings!
Super excited for interstellar travel and being able to build space planes with wing customization goodness

Woo! Interstellar, Interstellar, Interstellar! Not only the name of my favourite film, also something I am really excited about for KSP2! I have always thought KSP needed more celestial bodies in the stock game, but we would have lost the lore behind the many many years of KSP. 

Interstellar is a great way to keep the original stellar system as it was while also adding new features.

Sure, I can't wait for Multiplayer or colonies or orbital construction (don't get me started on orbital construction OMG) or all the other good stuff, but interstellar travel...
Excited for interstellar travel
one word: Interstellar!

Im astronomically exited, like a filled primed starship destined for mars! 

clouds, smoother frame rate, more parts, more to explore, modernized gameplay, more buildings and visually appealing content. 

 I've been prepping vehicle designs since the ksp2 announcement.  Im even planning on rebuilding my favorite old ones from the first one too. the adventure will be exiting, and non stop
Really excited for colonies, but also modding! I've been playing since 2015 and it's been delightful to see how far the game has come and how we evolved as a community!

I’m excited for the orbital construction system. Of course there are mods for it in KSP1 but I’ve never been able to get them to work properly so having it in the base game will be a huge game changer
Excited to try the parking garages.
I am excited to participate and see the progess of development!
I'm exited for the interstellar travel! I've been waiting this game since 2019 and I would really like to burn my gtx 750 :D
I can't wait for the Kraken to be slain.
I'm just excited for deeper mod support honestly

Gameplay-wise, I'm most excited for the procedural wings and realistic-ish fuel types.

Visuals-wise, I'm excited for the general quantum leap in quality as well as the realistic rocket exhaust plumes.
